page.title: 06BIRCOTES SPORTS CENTRE (2)
page.content: We found out from our survey that 50% used the{sports centre}more than once a week.About the same used the sports centre about once a week.The most popular sports are{swimming}with 42% {badminton}with 34% and{squash}with 24%.60% thought that the sports centre could be improved and 40% said it could not be improved.86% said they enjoyed the activities and 14% said that they enjoyed some of the sports.We were{surprised}to find out that{most of the people using the {sports centre came from outside our {villages.}62% of the people we asked came from outside our villages.36% came from the three villages {Harworth,Bircotes and Styrrup. }
